original_title: Ivan & Alyosha: Live at Benaroya Hall with the Seattle Symphony
overview: In March 2021, Ivan & Alyosha had the amazing opportunity to perform with the Seattle Symphony as part of its Essential Series. After months of work and the show being cancelled and rescheduled due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, the performance was live-streamed from Benaroya Hall in Seattle, Washington. This documentary captured the bandâ€™s time with the symphony.
title: Ivan & Alyosha: Live at Benaroya Hall with the Seattle Symphony
